content: Great, John. I have checked and you are definitely within our service area. When would be the ideal time for our plumber to come by?
Tomorrow afternoon would work best for me, after 2 PM.
Let me check our schedule for tomorrow afternoon.
Good news, we have availability tomorrow starting at 2:30 PM. Shall I book an appointment for you then?
Yes, that works. Please book it.
Your appointment is booked for tomorrow at 2:30 PM. Our plumber will be there to fix those leaks. If you have any questions before then, feel free to reach out.
